title: mOmu jUpaga
sahitya:
mOmu jUpaga rAdA muddugAru nIdu


anupallavi

  sOma shEkharanuta sogasu kuluku nIdu


caraNam 1    vinula kimpuga vINacEta bUni gAnamu salpi nI kALLaku mrokkaga
    caraNam 2    amara kOTulak-kabhaya mosangeDu namala nayananAdu kanula karuvu dIra
    caraNam 3    gOpAladAsa hrttApa nivAraNa rApusEyaka madi ranjillagA nEDu
